Text:
A good portion of these files are fucked! 

At least make sure your uploads are working properly before you put them up, jesus.
Not only does every episode work, but they all stream to the PS3 perfectly without needing to be transcoded.
portions of the episodes are simply blank. would not recommend.
I retract my earlier comment, I was looking at another season, this one is definitely broken.
Bad upload. Like stephenball70 said, about half of the episodes are unwatchable or missing a few minutes. Even on the ones that work, quality is very inconsistent.
